sn22.60:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
sn22.60:4.3: Atha kho mahāli licchavi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn22.60:4.4: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahāli licchavi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.60:5.4: Natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:6.1: “Atthi, mahāli, hetu atthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:6.3: Atthi, mahāli, hetu, atthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:7.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:8.1: “Rūpañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṃ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā rūpasmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:8.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṃ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:8.5: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya;
sn22.60:9.1: Vedanā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā vedanāya sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:9.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, vedanā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā vedanāya sārajjanti;
sn22.60:9.5: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:10.2: saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhā abhavissaṃsu dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:10.3: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, saṅkhārā sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena, tasmā sattā saṅkhāresu sārajjanti;
sn22.60:10.6: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:11.1: Viññāṇañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantadukkhaṃ abhavissa dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, nayidaṃ sattā viññāṇasmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:11.2: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṃ sārajjanti;
sn22.60:11.5: Ayampi kho, mahāli, hetu ayaṃ paccayo sattānaṃ saṅkilesāya.
sn22.60:12.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu katamo paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā;
sn22.60:12.3: “Rūpañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṃ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, nayidaṃ sattā rūpasmiṃ nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:12.4: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, tasmā sattā rūpasmiṃ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:12.7: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, sattānaṃ visuddhiyā.
sn22.60:13.1: Vedanā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissa … pe …
sn22.60:13.3: saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhā abhavissaṃsu … pe …
sn22.60:13.4: viññāṇañca hidaṃ, mahāli, ekantasukhaṃ abhavissa sukhānupatitaṃ sukhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ dukkhena, nayidaṃ sattā viññāṇasmiṃ nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn22.60:13.5: Yasmā ca kho, mahāli, viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhānupatitaṃ dukkhāvakkantaṃ anavakkantaṃ sukhena, tasmā sattā viññāṇasmiṃ nibbindanti;
sn22.60:13.8: Ayaṃ kho, mahāli, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, sattānaṃ visuddhiyā.
